role.argrole: knower/ the one who is aware

example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ وَ-) (NP-TMP (ADV -أَمْسِ)) (VP (PV_PASS+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS عُلِمَ) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مَصْدَرٍ)) (PP-LOC (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN مَرْفَأ) (NP (NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC سَبْتَةَ)))))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أَنَّ) (S (NP-TPC-2 (NOUN_PROP مَدْرِيد)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS أَرْسَلَت) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *T*)) (ADVP (ADV+CASE_INDEF_ACC أَيْضاً)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC فِرْقاطَةً)) (PP-PRP (PREP لِ-) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN -تَعْزِيزِ) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أُسْطُولِ-) (POSS_PRON_3FS -ها) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN البَحْرِيِّ)))) (PP-LOC (PREP قُبالَةَ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN الجِيْبَيْنِ))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: from a source at the port
that Madrid sent support for its navy

example.arg: أَنَّ مَدْرِيد أَرْسَلَت أَيْضاً فِرْقاطَةً لِ- -تَعْزِيزِ أُسْطُولِ- -ها البَحْرِيِّ قُبالَةَ الجِيْبَيْنِ
